price: 70. cuando preguntó a su padre y a su pueblo: “¿Qué es lo que adoran?”.
arabic: إِذۡ قَالَ لِأَبِيهِ وَقَوۡمِهِۦ مَا تَعۡبُدُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: idh qāla li-abīhi waqawmihi mā taʿbudūna
